body: This page links to resources maintained by the [SAA Encoded Archival Description Roundtable](http://www2.archivists.org/groups/encoded-archival-description-ead-roundtable/) hosted on Github. ## [User-Contributed EAD Stylesheets](http://saa-ead-roundtable.github.com/ead-stylesheets) A repository for the EAD user community to share XSLT stylesheets and related resources for the rendering of archival description expressed in EAD. ## [EAD 1.0 to EAD 2002 Conversion Package](http://saa-ead-roundtable.github.com/ead1.0-to-2002-conversion) Converts valid EAD 1.0 instances to EAD 2002 instances. This package was originally developed by Stephen Yearl. ## EAD Cookbook Markup recommendations, stylesheets, and software tools to render EAD finding aids. These packages were originally developed by Michael Fox. * [EAD 2002 Cookbook (.ZIP)](https://github.com/downloads/saa-ead-roundtable/saa-ead-roundtable.github.com/EAD2002cookbook.zip) * [EAD 1.0 Cookbook (.ZIP)](https://github.com/downloads/saa-ead-roundtable/saa-ead-roundtable.github.com/ead1cookbook.zip) To have your project hosted here, please contact the [Roundtable Leadership](http://saa.archivists.org/4DCGI/committees/Roles.html?Action=Show_Comm_Roles&CommCode=SAA**CTBL-EAD&Name=Officers&Status=Active).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: SAA EAD Roundtable at Github
